title: Ashes/Axis
dek: On their fourth album proper, Cuddle Magic dive into the pop side of chamber pop with more fluency and confidence than they've ever shown in the past.

title: Performance
dek: The Copenhagen duo Age Coin features two former members of the post-punk band Lower producing bleak industrial techno. Their second LP is inconsistent, but shows promise.
